short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically validates and reviews code generated by chatgpt.com or claude.ai and provides feedback about security issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
### Secure AI Generated Code

Secure AI Generated Code is a must-have Chrome extension for developers using chatgpt.com and claude.ai. This extension automatically scans all code snippets generated on these platforms for potential security issues and provides instant feedback.

**Key Features:**
- **AI-Specific Integration:** Exclusively works with chatgpt.com and claude.ai for accurate security checks.
- **Comprehensive Scanning:** Detects and analyzes all code snippets on the page.
- **Real-Time Warnings:** Displays warnings and detailed feedback when security issues are found.

**Why Install?**
- **Stay Secure:** Identify and fix vulnerabilities early in your development process.
- **Enhance Knowledge:** Learn about common security issues and best practices.
- **Save Time:** Automate the process of reviewing code for security flaws.
- **Peace of Mind:** Ensure your AI-generated code meets industry security standards.

**Who Benefits?**
- **AI Platform Users:** Ideal for developers using chatgpt.com or claude.ai for coding.
- **Security-Conscious Developers:** Perfect for developers who prioritize secure coding practices.

Install Secure AI Generated Code today and code with confidence!
